## Collaboration Issue

### Repository: [Repository Name]
### Collaborator: [GitHub Username]
### Email: [Contact Email]

### Issue Type
- [ ] Repository access denied
- [ ] Branch not visible
- [ ] Cannot push changes
- [ ] Missing collaborator permissions
- [ ] Documentation issue
- [ ] Other: _____

### Description
[Describe the collaboration issue]

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Try to access: https://github.com/[owner]/[repo]/tree/[branch]
2. Attempt to clone: `git clone -b [branch] https://github.com/[owner]/[repo].git`
3. Try to push changes

### Expected Access
- [ ] Read access to repository
- [ ] Write access to branch
- [ ] Ability to create pull requests
- [ ] Wiki edit access
- [ ] Project board access

### Current Status
[Describe what currently happens]
